2010.question: Discuss the future of English in India.
2010.prashna: भारत में अंग्रेजी के भविष्य पर चर्चा करें।

2011.question: Write a note on Modern English.
2011.prashna: आधुनिक अंग्रेजी पर एक टिप्पणी लिखें।

2012.question: Write a short note on English as a world Language.
2012.prashna: विश्व भाषा के रूप में अंग्रेजी पर एक संक्षिप्त टिप्पणी लिखें।

2013.question:
Name the authors of the following prose pieces:
(a) Bharat is My Home
(b) A Pinch of Snuff
(c) How Free is the Press.
2013.prashna:
निम्नलिखित गद्य रचनाओं के लेखकों के नाम बताइए:
(क) भारत इज माई होम
(ख) ए पिंच ऑफ स्नफ
(ग) हाउ फ्री इज द प्रेस

2015.question: Translate the following sentences into English:
2015.prashna: निम्नलिखित वाक्यों का अंग्रेजी में अनुवाद करें:

sub_questions.e: क्या तुम्हें अंग्रेजी बोलना आता है?

anuprashna.e: Do you know how to speak English?

2015.question: Write the summary of any one of the following poems: (a) My Grandmother's House (b) Snake (c) The Soldier (d) To Autumn
2015.prashna: निम्नलिखित में से किसी एक कविता का सारांश लिखें: (क) माई ग्रैंडमदर्स हाउस (ख) स्नेक (ग) द सोल्जर (घ) टू ऑटम

2015.question: Name the authors of the following books:
2015.prashna: निम्नलिखित पुस्तकों के लेखकों के नाम लिखें:

2016.question: Name the poets who wrote the following lines: (a) Yester night the Sunne went hence / And yet is here today / He hath no desire no sense / Nor halfe so short a way. (b) I celebrate myself and sing myself / An what I assume you shall assume, / For every atom belonging to me as good belongs to you. (c) Cold, impossible, ahead / Lifts the mountain's lovely head / Whose white waterfall could bless / Travellers in their last distress. (d) An where the water had dripped from the taps in a small clearness / He sipped with his straight mouth / Softly drank through his straight gums, / into his slack long body silently. (e) Here lies a most beautiful lady. / Light of step and heart was she, / I think she was the most beautiful lady / That every was in the West Country.
2016.prashna: उन कवियों के नाम बताइए जिन्होंने निम्नलिखित पंक्तियाँ लिखी हैं: (क) Yester night the Sunne went hence... (ख) I celebrate myself and sing myself... (ग) Cold, impossible, ahead... (घ) An where the water had dripped... (ङ) Here lies a most beautiful lady...

2016.question: Name any five English poets.
2016.prashna: किन्हीं पांच अंग्रेजी कवियों के नाम लिखिए।

2018.question: We saw them quarrel. (Choose the most suitable passive voice)
2018.prashna: हमने उन्हें झगड़ते देखा। (सबसे उपयुक्त कर्मवाच्य चुनें)

options.A: They were seen by we quarrel.
options.B: They were quarrelling as seen by us.
options.D: They were quarrelling seen by us.

vikalpa.A: They were seen by we quarrel.
vikalpa.B: They were quarrelling as seen by us.
vikalpa.D: They were quarrelling seen by us.

2019.question: They .................... here next week. (Choose the correct verb form )
The line 'Hoping to cease not till death' is taken from .................... (Choose the correct option)
Write a summary of any one of the following poems in about 100 words:

2020.question: He has broken his leg, so he………. play football. (Choose the correct auxiliary verb)
2020.prashna: उसका पैर टूट गया है, इसलिए वह फुटबॉल नहीं ......। (सही सहायक क्रिया चुनें)

2020.question: ‘Are you coming with us?' He asked me. (Choose the correct indirect speech)
2020.prashna: 'क्या तुम हमारे साथ आ रहे हो?' उसने मुझसे पूछा। (सही इनडायरेक्ट स्पीच चुनें)

options.A: He asked me if I was coming with them
options.B: He asks if I was coming with them
options.C: He had asked if I was coming with them
options.D: He will ask if I am coming with them

vikalpa.A: He asked me if I was coming with them
vikalpa.B: He asks if I was coming with them
vikalpa.C: He had asked if I was coming with them
vikalpa.D: He will ask if I am coming with them

2020.question: Answer any five of the following in about 40-50 words:
2020.prashna: निम्नलिखित में से किन्हीं पाँच के उत्तर लगभग 40-50 शब्दों में दें:

sub_questions.a: Why did the poet feel honoured?
sub_questions.b: What conditions prevail in the woods?
sub_questions.c: What is civilization in the real sense of the term?
sub_questions.d: What are the 'trials and tribulations' Martin Luther King, Jr. talks about?
sub_questions.e: What is the impact of poverty in medical field?
sub_questions.f: What is Dr. Zakir Hussain's concept of education?
sub_questions.g: Which event does the expression 'the burning ghat' refer to?
sub_questions.h: What are the features of drama?
sub_questions.i: Name the areas where English is used as a second language.

anuprashna.a: कवि ने सम्मानित क्यों महसूस किया?
anuprashna.b: जंगलों में कैसी स्थितियाँ व्याप्त हैं?
anuprashna.c: शब्द के वास्तविक अर्थ में सभ्यता क्या है?
anuprashna.d: मार्टिन लूथर किंग, जूनियर किन 'परीक्षणों और कष्टों' के बारे में बात करते हैं?
anuprashna.e: चिकित्सा क्षेत्र में गरीबी का क्या प्रभाव है?
anuprashna.f: डॉ. जाकिर हुसैन की शिक्षा की अवधारणा क्या है?
anuprashna.g: अभिव्यक्ति 'द बर्निंग घाट' किस घटना को संदर्भित करती है?
anuprashna.i: उन क्षेत्रों के नाम बताइए जहाँ अंग्रेजी का प्रयोग दूसरी भाषा के रूप में किया जाता है।
anuprashna.j: किस वजह से अंग्रेजी में उधार (borrowings) आए?

2020.question:
Write a summary of any one of the following poems:
(i) Snake
(ii) Sweetest Love, I Do Not Goe
(iii) Fire-Hymn
2020.prashna:
निम्नलिखित में से किसी एक कविता का सारांश लिखें:
(i) Snake
(ii) Sweetest Love, I Do Not Goe
(iii) Fire-Hymn

2021.question: You ............... give up smoking. (Choose the correct option)
2021.prashna: आपको धूम्रपान ............... छोड़ देना चाहिए। (सही विकल्प चुनें)

2021.question: Choose the correctly spelt word :
2021.prashna: सही वर्तनी वाले शब्द को चुनें :

2021.question: ............... is bad for health. (Choose the correct option)
'Now the Leaves are Falling Fast' talks about the ............... of human life.
2021.prashna: 'नाउ द लीव्स आर फॉलिंग फास्ट' मानव जीवन की ............... के बारे में बात करती है।

2021.question:
Explain any one of the following : 
c) The past is not dead and static, it is alive and dynamic .....
2021.prashna:
निम्नलिखित में से किसी एक की व्याख्या करें: 
c) अतीत मृत और स्थिर नहीं है, यह जीवित और गतिशील है .....

2022.question: He said, "It may rain tomorrow." (Choose the correct indirect speech)
2022.prashna: उसने कहा, "कल बारिश हो सकती है।" (सही इनडायरेक्ट स्पीच चुनें)

options.A: The next day it will rain said he
options.B: The rain will be there tomorrow was said by him
options.C: He said that it might rain the next day
options.D: Raining tomorrow is what is said by him

vikalpa.A: The next day it will rain said he
vikalpa.B: The rain will be there tomorrow was said by him
vikalpa.C: He said that it might rain the next day
vikalpa.D: Raining tomorrow is what is said by him

2022.question: Advertisers contribute to the ............ of the newspaper.
2022.prashna: विज्ञापनदाता समाचार पत्र के ............ में योगदान करते हैं।

options.A: I asked her for chocolates, but she didn't had any
options.B: I asked for chocolates, but she didn't had none
options.C: I asked her for chocolates, but she didn't none
options.D: I asked her for chocolates, but she didn't have any

vikalpa.A: I asked her for chocolates, but she didn't had any
vikalpa.B: I asked for chocolates, but she didn't had none
vikalpa.C: I asked her for chocolates, but she didn't none
vikalpa.D: I asked her for chocolates, but she didn't have any

2023.question: They will wash the car............? (Choose the correct option)
I don't know how the money I kept in my wallet got............. (Choose the correct option)
2023.prashna: मुझे नहीं पता कि मेरे बटुए में रखे पैसे कैसे ............. हो गए (सही विकल्प चुनें)

2023.question: Who is considered the greatest English dramatist?
2023.prashna: किसे सबसे महान अंग्रेजी नाटककार माना जाता है?

vikalpa.B: लोगों का सेवक (servant of the people)

2023.question: Write the summary of any one of the following poems: (i) Ode to Autumn (ii) Fire-Hymn (iii) Snake
2023.prashna: निम्नलिखित में से किसी एक कविता का सारांश लिखें: (i) ओड टू ऑटम (ii) फायर-हाइमन (iii) स्नेक

2024.question: Nadal won all the matches played in Paris. (Choose the correct negative sentence)
2024.prashna: नडाल ने पेरिस में खेले गए सभी मैच जीते। (सही नकारात्मक वाक्य चुनें)

options.A: Nadal does not win all the matches played in Paris.
options.B: Nadal did not lose a single match played in Paris.
options.C: Nadal was not able to lose any match played in Paris.
options.D: Nadal had lost any match not played in Paris.

vikalpa.A: नडाल पेरिस में खेले गए सभी मैच नहीं जीतता है।
vikalpa.B: नडाल ने पेरिस में खेला गया एक भी मैच नहीं हारा।
vikalpa.C: नडाल पेरिस में कोई भी मैच हारने में सक्षम नहीं था।
vikalpa.D: नडाल ने पेरिस में नहीं खेले गए किसी भी मैच को खो दिया था।

2024.question: Neither of the two men ........... done this. (Choose the correct option)
2024.prashna: दोनों में से किसी भी आदमी ने यह ........... किया है। (सही विकल्प चुनें)

2024.question: Find out the ........... things. (Choose the correct option)
I didn't ........... where he was going. (Choose the correct option)
2024.prashna: मुझे ........... नहीं था कि वह कहाँ जा रहा था। (सही विकल्प चुनें)

2024.question: Explain any one of the following : ‘My life has been too crowded with travels and many people for me to put it all within the covers of one book, ...’
2024.prashna: निम्नलिखित में से किसी एक की व्याख्या करें: 'मेरा जीवन यात्राओं और कई लोगों से इतना भरा हुआ रहा है कि मैं इसे एक पुस्तक के कवर के भीतर नहीं रख सकता, ...'

2024.question: Write a note on the Indian English.
2024.prashna: भारतीय अंग्रेजी पर एक टिप्पणी लिखें।

2025.question: The children locked ......... up in the cupboard.
2025.prashna: बच्चों ने खुद को अलमारी में बंद कर लिया।

2025.question: We arrived on ......... fourth of July.
2025.prashna: हम जुलाई की चौथी तारीख को पहुंचे।

2025.question: I ......... swim across the river.
2025.prashna: मैं नदी तैरकर पार कर सकता हूँ।

2025.question: ......... they played well, they could not win.
2025.prashna: ......... उन्होंने अच्छा खेला, वे जीत नहीं सके।

2025.question: I am not ill, but I am ......... tired.
He said, "I am going to college just now." (Choose the correct indirect narration)
2025.prashna: उसने कहा, "मैं अभी कॉलेज जा रहा हूँ।" (सही अप्रत्यक्ष कथन चुनें)

options.A: He said that he was going to college just now.
options.B: He asked that he was going to college just then.
options.C: He said that he was going to college just then.
options.D: He asked that he was going to college just now.

vikalpa.A: उसने कहा कि वह अभी कॉलेज जा रहा था।
vikalpa.B: उसने पूछा कि वह तभी कॉलेज जा रहा था।
vikalpa.C: उसने कहा कि वह तभी कॉलेज जा रहा था।
vikalpa.D: उसने पूछा कि वह अभी कॉलेज जा रहा था।

2025.question: Old English Period covers
2025.prashna: पुरानी अंग्रेजी अवधि का समय है

2025.question: The food in Indian villages was served on ......... leaves.
2025.prashna: भारतीय गाँवों में भोजन ......... के पत्तों पर परोसा जाता था।
